name: CI - Maven Build

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
      - develop
  pull_request:

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout c√≥digo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up JDK 21
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          distribution: 'temurin'
          java-version: '21'

      - name: Build com Maven
        run: mvn -f servicoatendimento/pom.xml clean package -DskipTests
